definitions.body: :1Ki 5:13 hyssop (Mish. [[אזוב]], Aram. zuwp0, Ar. zuwfa0 Frey., Eth. 0azabe: LXX u(/sswpov, herb of purging qualities, but perh. not precise botanical term, v. Di Le 14:6 f; v. also Löw:93)—´[[א]] abs. Ex 12:22 + 4 t.; [[אֵזׁב]] Le 14:4 + 4 t.;—hyssop, little plant (contr. [[אֶרֶז]] cedar) 1Ki 5:13, [[אֲשֶׁר יׁחֵא בַּקִּיר]] ´[[הָא]]; Ex 12:22 (J) ´[[אֲגֻדַּת א]] a bunch of h. for sprinkling blood on doorposts; without [[אגדת]], used in cleansing from leprosy Le 14:4, Le 14:6, Le 14:49, Le 14:51, Le 14:52; burnt with red heifer Nu 19:6; used in cleansing with ashes of red heifer v:Nu 19:18 (all P); cf. Ps 51:9 [[וְאֶטְהָָר]] ´[[תְּחַטְּאֵנִי בְּא]].
